name: Rocketable
headline: The AI maximalist software holding company
description:
Rocketable is building a large portfolio of wildly profitable software businesses by acquiring existing products and replacing human teams with AI agents.

Today’s foundation models already possess enough intelligence to automate most of the tasks required to run a profitable software business. In the functions where agents aren’t yet intelligent enough to replace humans, they will be soon.

When every human function required to operate a software product has an AI agent equivalent, the next step will be within reach: operating an entire company with a team of AI agents instead of humans.

But superintelligent agents within each function won’t be enough. To operate a software company with 0 human employees, the agents will need to be directed towards common goals, integrated to collaborate across functions, tuned with feedback loops connected to product metrics, and trained to make resource allocation decisions.

We are creating the tools needed to replace the entire org chart of a software company with a team of AI agents. We are developing these tools by owning the products that we automate, because we know from 10+ years of experience building automated systems with AI/ML that integration is the key to unlocking superhuman performance.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:investments; industry:automation; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Alan Wells, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO of Rocketable. Previously: 10+ years building products and leading teams that automated complex tasks with AI/ML: robotaxis at Cruise, self-driving trucks and ADAS systems at Uber, and an irrigation co-pilot product for farmers at Tule (YC S14). 

I write code, have a degree in design, and build hardware. Co-author on 5 patents related to systems & methods for automating complex tasks with AI.

generated_description:
# Rocketable: The AI Maximalist Software Holding Company

Founded in **2023** and based in **San Francisco**, Rocketable is positioning itself at the forefront of an impending revolution in software management. As part of **Y Combinator Batch W25**, the company is laser-focused on creating a substantial portfolio of highly profitable software businesses. How do they plan to do this? By acquiring existing products and replacing human teams with **AI agents**.

## Mission and Vision

Rocketable is driven by the belief that today's advanced AI models possess the necessary intelligence to automate most tasks required for running a software business. They envision a future where every human role can be replicated by AI, allowing companies to operate entirely without human employees. The crux of their strategy lies in not just deploying AI agents but ensuring they work in harmony toward common objectives.

To achieve this, Rocketable is developing tools that facilitate:
- **Collaboration** across different functions of the business.
- **Feedback mechanisms** tied to product metrics.
- **Training** that empowers AI to make resource allocation decisions.

## The Process

Rocketable’s approach is straightforward but ambitious:
1. **Acquire** an existing software product.
2. **Replace** its human employees with specially designed AI agents.
3. **Iterate** until these AI agents achieve consistently superior performance.
4. **Repeat** this cycle at a larger scale.

This process aims to unlock what they refer to as **superhuman outcomes**: higher-quality products that customers love, developed faster and at a fraction of current costs.

## The Future of Software Companies

The overarching vision is bold—imagining a world where single-person, billion-dollar software companies are not just dreams but reality. Rocketable believes that well-crafted, coordinated AI can revolutionize software management, pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

As part of their mission, they invite existing software product owners (with at least **$100K in annual profit**) to consider selling their products and encourage talented individuals with AI and automation skills to apply to help craft best-in-class AI agents.

## Conclusion

Rocketable is poised to redefine what it means to run a software company. By leveraging AI to replace traditional work structures, they are not just betting on the future—they're actively creating it. If you're interested in learning more or keeping up with their journey, check out their website [Rocketable](https://www.rocketable.com).

In a rapidly evolving landscape, Rocketable is an emblem of what's possible when AI meets ambition.
